e401: Unauthorized - Unable to authenticate, please check your API key and try again.
e403: Forbidden - The request is not allowed.
e404: Not Found - The specified resource could not be found. Please contact developer on discord at MrShadow#0001.
e429: Too many requests - You are being rate limited, please try again later.
e500: Internal Server Error - Sellix.io API is currently experiencing issues, please try again later.
e503: Service Unavailable - Sellix.io is temporarily offline for maintenance, Please try again later.
